chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : list (Term A n)), CombLinear Q p -> forall q : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> eqP A eqA n p q -> CombLinear Q q

```coq
intros Q p q Hq Hp Hpq.
assert (Hr: exists r, reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q r).
apply red_minus_zero_reduce with (p:=p) (q:=q); auto.
destruct Hr as [r [Hpr Hqr]].
assert (Hrq: eqP A eqA n r q).
apply order_reduceplus with (p:=p) (q:=r); auto.
destruct Hrq as [Hlt | Heq]; auto.
right; apply reduceplus_eqp_com with (r:=r); auto.
Qed.```

original: intros Q p q Hq Hp Hpq. assert (Hr: exists r, reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q r). apply red_minus_zero_reduce with (p:=p) (q:=q); auto. destruct Hr as [r [Hpr Hqr]]. assert (Hrq: eqP A eqA n r q). apply order_reduceplus with (p:=p) (q:=r); auto. destruct Hrq as [Hlt | Heq]; auto. right; apply reduceplus_eqp_com with (r:=r); auto.
